title: #136 - PewDiePie Gets Married & YouTube Sues Copyright Troll
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we get into the weeds talking about purchasing a mobility scooter, we look at one of the dumbest products ever conceived by mankind, we talk about PewDiePie's wedding, we talk about YouTube suing a DMCA copyright troll into the freaking dirt, and a whole lot more!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
